title: Ash Wednesday
brief_description: Documents the restoration of essential electricity supply to fire damaged areas of Victoria after the bushfires of Ash Wednesday, 1983. Shows the work done by the SEC crews and the conditions with which they had to cope.
description: Documents the restoration of essential electricity supply to fire damaged areas of Victoria after the bushfires of Ash Wednesday, 1983. Shows the work done by the SEC crews and the conditions with which they had to cope.
